name: The Tardigang (A game by C. Moy and Y. He)
name_original: The Tardigang (A game by C. Moy and Y. He)
description:
Tardigrades are small micro-animals that are also known as water bears. They have a lot of existential angst, because they are so small, have such weird names, and have not been able to find true love. 

(Image from: https://www.amnh.org/explore/news-blogs/on-exhibit-posts/tough-tardigrades/)
